verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּלָכִ֡ים <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when all the kings אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [were] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <S%H8219><s%> and in the valleys וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all ח֚וֹף <S%H2348><s%> and in all the coasts הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> over against הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> Lebanon הַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorite הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanite הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusite

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> That they gathered יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> themselves together לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> with Joshua וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> and with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> and with Israel פֶּ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> accord אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> with one פ

וְיֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> And when the inhabitants גִבְע֜וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon שָׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> what Joshua לִֽירִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> unto Jericho וְלָעָֽי׃ <S%H5857><s%> and to Ai

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> They did work גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> like בְּעָרְמָ֔ה <S%H6195><s%> wilily וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and set וַיִּצְטַיָּ֑רוּ <S%H6737><s%> and made as if they had been ambassadors וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> and took שַׂקִּ֤ים <S%H8242><s%> sacks בָּלִים֙ <S%H1087><s%> old לַחֲמ֣וֹרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2543><s%> upon their asses וְנֹאד֥וֹת <S%H4997><s%> bottles יַ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> and wine בָּלִ֔ים <S%H1087><s%> old וּמְבֻקָּעִ֖ים <S%H1234><s%> and rent וּמְצֹרָרִֽים׃ <S%H6887><s%> and bound up

וּנְעָל֨וֹת <S%H5275><s%> shoes בָּל֤וֹת <S%H1087><s%> And old וּמְטֻלָּאוֹת֙ <S%H2921><s%> and clouted בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> upon their feet וּשְׂלָמ֥וֹת <S%H8008><s%> garments בָּל֖וֹת <S%H1087><s%> and old עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> on וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> upon them and all the bread צֵידָ֔ם <S%H6720><s%> meat יָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3001><s%> was dry הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <S%H5350><s%> [and] mouldy

וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> to Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> at Gilgal וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to him אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him and to the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country רְחוֹקָה֙ <S%H7350><s%> from a far בָּ֔אנוּ <S%H935><s%> We be come וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now כִּרְתוּ־ <S%H3772><s%> now therefore make לָ֥נוּ בְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> ye a league

[וַיֹּאמְרוּ כ] (וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answer ק) אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַחִוִּ֑י <S%H2340><s%> unto the Hivites אוּלַ֗י <S%H194><s%> Peradventure בְּקִרְבִּי֙ <S%H7130><s%> among אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> ye dwell וְאֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> how [אֶכְרֹות־ כ] (אֶֽכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> make לְךָ֥ <S%H3772><s%> us and how shall we make ק) בְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> a league

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> We [are] thy servants אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֧ם <S%H413><s%> then יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> are you וּמֵאַ֥יִן <S%H370><s%> unto them Who [are] ye? and from whence תָּבֹֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> come

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country רְחוֹקָ֤ה <S%H7350><s%> far מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> unto him From a very בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants לְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> because of the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֣עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> for we have heard שָׁמְע֔וֹ <S%H8089><s%> the fame וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> of him and all that he did בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> And all that he did לִשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> to the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan לְסִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> to Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon וּלְע֥וֹג <S%H5747><s%> and to Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H6252><s%> which [was] at Ashtaroth

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> spake אֵלֵ֡ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about זְֽקֵינֵינוּ֩ <S%H2205><s%> Wherefore our elders וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants אַרְצֵ֜נוּ <S%H776><s%> of our country לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> to us saying קְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take בְיֶדְכֶ֤ם <S%H3027><s%> with you צֵידָה֙ <S%H6720><s%> victuals לַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> for the journey וּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H559><s%> them and say אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5650><s%> unto them We [are] your servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now כִּרְתוּ־ <S%H3772><s%> therefore now make לָ֥נוּ בְרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> ye a league

זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This לַחְמֵ֗נוּ <S%H3899><s%> This our bread חָ֞ם <S%H2525><s%> we took hot הִצְטַיַּ֤דְנוּ <S%H6679><s%> [for] our provision אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> out מִבָּ֣תֵּ֔ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> out of our houses בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on the day צֵאתֵ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> we came forth לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to you וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יָבֵ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> unto you but now behold it is dry וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become נִקֻּדִֽים׃ <S%H5350><s%> and it is mouldy

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These נֹאד֤וֹת <S%H4997><s%> And these bottles הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> of wine אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which מִלֵּ֣אנוּ <S%H4390><s%> which we filled חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> [were] new וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <S%H1234><s%> and behold they be rent וְאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these שַׂלְמוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H8008><s%> and these our garments וּנְעָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5275><s%> and our shoes בָּל֕וּ <S%H1086><s%> are become old מֵרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> by reason of the very

וַיִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> took הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> And the men מִצֵּידָ֑ם <S%H6718><s%> of their victuals וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> not [counsel] at the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁאָֽלוּ׃ <S%H7592><s%> and asked

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made לָהֶ֤ם יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> with them and made לָהֶ֛ם בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a league לְחַיּוֹתָ֑ם <S%H2421><s%> with them to let them live וַיִּשָּׁבְע֣וּ <S%H7650><s%> sware לָהֶ֔ם נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <S%H5387><s%> and the princes הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> And it came to pass at the end שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> of three יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they כָּרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> they had made לָהֶ֖ם בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> a league וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> with them that they heard כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קְרֹבִ֥ים <S%H7138><s%> that they [were] their neighbours הֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> among הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> and [that] they dwelt

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> journeyed בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עָרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> unto their cities בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> on the third וְעָרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5892><s%> Now their cities גִּבְע֣וֹן <S%H1391><s%> [were] Gibeon וְהַכְּפִירָ֔ה <S%H3716><s%> and Chephirah וּבְאֵר֖וֹת <S%H881><s%> and Beeroth וְקִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H7157><s%> and Kirjathjearim

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִכּוּם֙ <S%H5221><s%> smote בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <S%H7650><s%> had sworn לָהֶם֙ נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> them not because the princes הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּלֹּ֥נוּ <S%H3885><s%> murmured כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> And all the congregation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַנְּשִׂיאִֽים׃ <S%H5387><s%> against the princes

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <S%H5387><s%> But all the princes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <S%H7650><s%> We have sworn לָהֶ֔ם בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> and now לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> now therefore we may לִנְגֹּ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> not touch בָּהֶֽם׃

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> we נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> This we will do לָהֶ֖ם וְהַחֲיֵ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> to them we will even let them live אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> so יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> that קֶ֔צֶף <S%H7110><s%> lest wrath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> us הַשְּׁבוּעָ֖ה <S%H7621><s%> be upon us because of the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְנוּ <S%H7650><s%> which we sware לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְר֧וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> about הַנְּשִׂיאִ֖ים <S%H5387><s%> And the princes יִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> unto them Let them live וַ֠יִּֽהְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> became חֹטְבֵ֨י <S%H2404><s%> but let them be hewers עֵצִ֤ים <S%H6086><s%> of wood וְשֹֽׁאֲבֵי־ <S%H7579><s%> and drawers מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of water לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> had promised לָהֶ֖ם הַנְּשִׂיאִֽים׃ <S%H5387><s%> as the princes

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> for them and he spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying לָמָּה֩ <S%H4100><s%> Why רִמִּיתֶ֨ם <S%H7411><s%> Wherefore have ye beguiled אֹתָ֜נוּ <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> us saying רְחוֹקִ֨ים <S%H7350><s%> far אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> We מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> We [are] very וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you בְּקִרְבֵּ֥נוּ <S%H7130><s%> among יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> from you when ye dwell

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֲרוּרִ֣ים <S%H779><s%> Now therefore ye [are] cursed אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> and you וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יִכָּרֵ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> and there shall none of you be freed מִכֶּ֜ם <S%H4480><s%> being עֶ֗בֶד <S%H5650><s%> from being bondmen וְחֹטְבֵ֥י <S%H2404><s%> and hewers עֵצִ֛ים <S%H6086><s%> of wood וְשֹֽׁאֲבֵי־ <S%H7579><s%> and drawers מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> of my God

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> And they answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and said כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Because הֻגֵּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> Because it was certainly הֻגַּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> told לַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֜ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> how that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you all the land וּלְהַשְׁמִ֛יד <S%H8045><s%> and to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> all the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וַנִּירָ֨א <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֤ד <S%H3966><s%> you therefore we were sore לְנַפְשֹׁתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5315><s%> of our lives מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> because וַֽנַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> of you and have done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנְנ֣וּ <S%H2005><s%> are in בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in thine hand כַּטּ֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְכַיָּשָׁ֧ר <S%H3477><s%> and right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> as it seemeth לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> unto thee to do לָ֖נוּ עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto us do

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And so did לָהֶ֖ם כֵּ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus וַיַּצֵּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> he unto them and delivered אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not הֲרָגֽוּם׃ <S%H2026><s%> that they slew

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> made יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֹטְבֵ֥י <S%H2404><s%> hewers עֵצִ֛ים <S%H6086><s%> of wood וְשֹׁ֥אֲבֵי <S%H7579><s%> and drawers מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water לָֽעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> for the congregation וּלְמִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> and for the altar יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> which he should choose פ
